transcription: The new 2018 Jeep Wrangler.  Versatility, comfort and intuitive feature use. Precision craftsmanship and high quality materials are found throughout the cabin. A hand-wrapped instrument panel features a soft touch surface with accent stitching on Wrangler Sahara models. Functional features, including climate and volume control knobs, media charging and connectivity ports and engine stop-start, ESS, control are all sculpted for quick recognition and  are easily within reach of the front seat occupants.  The  Axles should return along with the classic boxy styling the two-door Wrangler and four-door Wrangler Unlimited models will more than likely return with the addition of the new Wrangler pickup do not be surprised to see popular trims like the sport and Rubicon return and limited special edition models as well  do
